sentences.en: " Movie " is a colloquial word for " moving picture " .
Bird - A colloquial expression used to refer to a communications satellite.
sentences.cn: 飞鸟 - 对通讯卫星的一种形象表述.

sentences.en: Both colloquial usage and slang are more common speech than in writing.
sentences.cn: 口头用法和俚语二者都是在口头语里比在书面语里更加常见.

sentences.en: His English then was fluent but not colloquial.
sentences.cn: 他的英语讲得很流利,但不够口语化.

sentences.en: His language is smooth, easy, colloquial and mostly vernacular.
sentences.cn: 他的措辞简朴易懂又口语化, 有时甚至是俗语方言.

sentences.en: His stumbling attempts at colloquial Russian amused her.
sentences.cn: 他结结巴巴地学说俄语，把她逗乐了。

sentences.en: Lyrics of popular, colloquial, easy to learn to sing.
sentences.cn: 唱词通俗 、 口语化, 易学易唱.

sentences.en: Maine colloquial temporary summer resident in inland Maine.
sentences.cn: (缅因方言)缅因内陆的夏日临时居民.

sentences.en: Many colloquial expressions have acquired literary currency through magazines.
sentences.cn: 许多口语用法是由杂志先用了才得以在文言中流传的.

sentences.en: The new textbooks are composed mainly of colloquial American English.
sentences.cn: 新教材,主要由地道的美式英语听说课构成.

sentences.en: These words sound too literary to give them colloquial currency.
sentences.cn: 这些词文绉绉的,不能作为口语使用.

sentences.en: They have little acquaintance with colloquial English.
sentences.cn: 他们对英语会话几乎一窍不通.

sentences.en: This brilliant, caustic, rambling satire is written in a colloquial style.
sentences.cn: 这篇光辉的, 刻薄的, 但很松散的讽刺叙事诗是以一种通俗的口语体写的.

sentences.en: This brilliant, rambling satires is written in a colloquial style.
sentences.cn: 这篇出色 、 结构松散的讽刺诗是用口语体写的.

words.tran_cn: 白话，口语；口语体；方言用语
以对话体写的文章；谈话，会话

trans.tran_en: language or words that are colloquial are used mainly in informal conversations rather than in writing or formal speech
